content.rendered:
Source: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/noswear.7773/

We use this plugin to help keep the InGame Chat clean.

Description
stop them from saying inappropriate words even on sign or chat
Tutorial
I appreciate if someone create new one
Permissions
Click here or go to http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/noswearing/pages/permissions/
Commands

  • /noswear | noswear.admin
  • /noswear add <word> | noswear.admin.add
  • /noswear delete <word> | noswear.admin.delete
  • /noswear list | noswear.list
  • /noswear clearchat or cc <*for all> or <targetname> | noswear.clearchat

Note : /clearchat or /cpc = clears the personal chatbox
/clearallchat or /cc = clears all player’s chatbox
Feautures

  • Stop chat swear
  • Stop sign swear
  • Kick from swearing ( Optional )
  • Explode them after Swearing ( Optional )
  • Can write own global permission node
  • Can notify them if the server uses anti swearing plugin
  • Can disable or enable join message with custom join and quit message with colors ‘&’
  • Can perform a command after player swear
  • And can change prefix of the plugin and many more
  • AntiCaps
  • AntiSpam
  • AntiAdvertise
  • Clear Personal, target player , and all players’s chat
  • ChatCooldown

Achievements

Downloads :

  • 10 Downloads
  • 20 Downloads
  • 50 Downloads
  • 100 Downloads
  • 200 Downloads
  • 300 Downloads
  • 400 Downloads


Reviews:

  • 1 Review
  • 5 Reviews
  • 10 Reviews

Credits
please donate
PayPal donation : https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=AWNSQ7EKRWL4S
Server website : bananarealms.net
Server IP : play.bananarealms.net

Config
Click here or go here http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/noswearing/pages/config/

Informations
all informations will be found here or go to the link http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/noswearing/

http://raymartdev.github.io/NoSwear/

Developer
Hello are you a developer ? you may found the codes here or at this link https://github.com/RaymartDev/NoSwear
